query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "LastPeriodCompare").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 < 0 then "#3CAF6D" when (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 > 0 then "#f2536d" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color';

a = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}";a = filter a by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"];a = filter a by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};a = group a by ('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day','RequestDateTime_Hour');a = foreach a generate 'RequestDateTime_Year'+"~~~"+'RequestDateTime_Month'+"~~~"+'RequestDateTime_Day' as 'each_date', 'RequestDateTime_Hour' as 'RequestDateTime_Hour', count() as 'date_hour_volume', unique('UserId.Name') as 'date_hour_agents_working' ;a= group a by 'RequestDateTime_Hour';a = foreach a generate 'RequestDateTime_Hour' as 'RequestDateTime_Hour', round(sum('date_hour_volume')/unique('each_date'),0) as 'Request Volume', round(sum('date_hour_agents_working')/unique('each_date'),0) as '# Agents Working';a = order a by ('RequestDateTime_Hour' asc)

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "LastPeriodCompare").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 < 0 then "#3CAF6D" when (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 > 0 then "#f2536d" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "LastPeriodCompare").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 < 0 then "#3CAF6D" when (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 > 0 then "#f2536d" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color';

step_ValuesTable.query: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"]; q = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};q = foreach q generate 'Name' as 'Name','Case.CaseNumber' as 'Case.CaseNumber', 'Case.Account.Name' as 'Case.Account.Name','UserId.Name' as 'UserId.Name','SpeedToAnswer' as 'SpeedToAnswer', 'HandleTime' as 'HandleTime','ActiveTime' as 'ActiveTime','Case.Origin' as 'Case.Origin','Group.Name' as 'Group.Name','Status' as 'Status', 'Case.${Constants.CaseProduct}' as 'Case.${Constants.CaseProduct}';q = limit q 100;

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOmniAgentWork.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "LastPeriodCompare").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 < 0 then "#3CAF6D" when (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 > 0 then "#f2536d" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color';
